channel.title: Mac, xp, or vista?
channel.description:
everywhere i look in vista forums or mac forums everybody is always like "vista is better than mac" "mac is better than vista" and this really gets annoying! In fact, i think there are way more programs for all windows and stuffs. Now there are also people who say xp is better than vista. Well, I am using vista and i have to admit, xp was waaaayyyy more stable. Even with vistas new aero (which i can't use), it doesn't make vista any better if u want aero on ur xp. go ahead! download topdesk, and vista theme for ur operating system and your done! IF YOU ALREADY HAVE XP DON"T BOTHER TO GO TO VISTA. Now maybe if you have mac, you might consider going to vista. Of course, I am not saying in general vista is the worst so don't download it, actually when SP1 is released, you should upgrade to vista. thanks for readin
also miss silabsoft, why isn't http://silabsoft.no-ip.org/output.txt working. please try to get it to work or post the file for download. ty

item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p

gtfo
